summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York incident report documenting the recovery of an intake phone log book on May 19, 2020. The log book contained a record of a phone call made by inmate Jeffrey Epstein on July 30, 2019, shortly after his arrest. The document is a photo spread of the recovered log book.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose intake phone call from July 30, 2019, is recorded in the recovered log book. He is identified by register number 76318-054.

events.title: Intake Phone Log Book Opened
events.description: The green colored intake screening phone log book was opened at MCC New York.

events.title: Epstein's Intake Phone Call
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein made an intake phone call at approximately 5:15 p.m. This call was recorded in the recovered log book.

events.title: Intake Phone Log Book Closed
events.description: The green colored intake screening phone log book was closed at MCC New York.

events.title: Recovery of Intake Phone Log
events.description: Staff at MCC New York recovered a green intake screening phone log book that contained the record of Epstein's July 2019 phone call.

keyFacts: A phone log book documenting a call made by Jeffrey Epstein on July 30, 2019, at approximately 5:15 p.m. was recovered from MCC New York on May 19, 2020.
The log book was opened on September 13, 2017, and closed on May 13, 2020.
The document is a photo spread of the recovered log book, indicating it was entered as evidence or for record-keeping.
